name: gulp-embed
description: a gulp plugin wrapper around resource-embedder2(modified version of resource-embedder)
readme:
# [gulp](https://github.com/wearefractal/gulp)-embed
> a gulp plugin wrapper around resource-embedder

## Install

Install with [npm](https://npmjs.org/package/gulp-embed).

```
npm install --save-dev gulp-embed
```
